heading: ʻOku lea ʻa ʻĪsaia ʻo kau ki he Mīsaiá—ʻE mamata ʻa e kakai ʻi he fakapoʻulí ki ha maama lahi—ʻE ʻaloʻi mai ha tama kiate kitautolu—ʻE hoko ia ko e Pilinisi ʻo e Melinó pea te ne pule ʻi he taloni ʻo Tēvitá—Fakafehoanaki mo e ʻĪsaia vahe 9. Taʻu 559–545 K.M. nai.

verses.txt: Ka neongo iá, ʻe ʻikai matolu tatau ʻa e fakapoʻulí mo hono fakamamahiʻi iá, ʻi hono fuofua fakamamahiʻi siʻi kae ʻikai fakaʻauha kakato ʻa e fonua ʻo Sepuloní, mo e fonua ʻo Nafitalaí; pea toki fakamamahiʻi lahi ange ki mui, ʻi he Tahi Kulokulá ki kō atu ʻi Soatani ʻi Kāleli ʻo e ngaahi puleʻangá.
Ko e kakai ʻa ia naʻe ʻaʻeva ʻi he poʻulí kuo nau mamata ki he maama lahi; ʻa kinautolu ʻoku nofo ʻi he fonua ʻo e malumalu ʻo e mate kuo ulo kiate kinautolu ʻa e māmá.

Kuó ke fakatokolahi ʻa e puleʻangá, pea fakalahi ʻa e fiefiá—ʻoku nau fakafiefia ʻi ho ʻaó ʻo hangē ko e fiefia ʻi he taimi utu taʻú, pea hangē ko e fakafiefia ʻa e kau tangatá ʻo nau ka vahevahe ʻa e koloa veté.
He kuó ke fesiʻi ʻa e haʻamo ʻo ʻene kavengá, pea mo e ʻakau fakalava ki hono umá, ʻa e meʻa tā ʻa hono tokotaha fakamamahí.
He ko e tau kotoa pē ʻa e tangata taú ko e longoaʻa fakatupu puputuʻu ia, mo honau ngaahi kofu kuo pani totó; ka ʻe tutu ia pea hoko ko e fefie ki he afí.

He kuo fanauʻi kiate kitautolu ha tama, kuo foaki kiate kitautolu ha foha; pea ʻe ʻi hono umá ʻa e pule; pea ʻe ui ʻa hono huafá ko Fakaofo, ko Akonaki, ko e ʻOtua Māfimafi, ko e Tamai Taʻengata, ko e Pilinisi ʻo e Melino.

Pea ko e tupulaki ʻa hono puleʻangá mo e melinó ʻoku ʻikai hano ngataʻanga, pea ʻafio ‘i he ʻafioʻanga ʻo Tēvitá, pea ʻi hono puleʻangá ke fakamaau ia, mo fokotuʻu ia ʻi he fakamaau mo e fakamaau totonu ʻo kamata mei he taimi ko iá, ʻio ʻo taʻengata. Ko e māfimafi ʻo e ʻEiki ʻo e Ngaahi Kau Taú te ne fakahoko iá.
Naʻe fekau atu ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa ʻene folofolá kia Sēkope, pea kuo tō ia ki ʻIsileli.
Pea ʻe ʻiloʻi ʻe he kakai kotoa pē, ʻio ʻe ʻIfalemi mo e kakai ʻo Samēliá, ʻa kinautolu ʻoku pehē ʻi he hīkisia mo e fielahi ʻo e lotó:

Kuo tō ki lalo ʻa e ngaahi maka kuo langa ʻaki hotau ngaahi koló, ka te mau langa ʻaki ha ngaahi maka kuo tā; kuo tuʻusi ki lalo ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau ko e sukaminó, ka te mau fetongi ʻaki ia ʻa e ʻakau ko e sitá.
Ko ia, ʻe fokotuʻu hake ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e ngaahi fili ʻo Lēsiní kiate ia, pea fakakau fakataha ʻa hono ngaahi filí;

ʻA e kakai ʻo Sīliá ʻi muʻa pea mo e kau Filisitiá ʻi mui; pea te nau keina ʻa ʻIsileli ʻaki ʻa e ngutu kuo fakamanga. Neongo kotoa ʻení ʻoku teʻeki ai ke lolou ʻa hono houhaú, ka ʻoku kei mafao atu ʻa hono toʻukupú.
He ʻoku ʻikai tafoki ʻa e kakaí kiate ia ʻokú ne taaʻi ʻa kinautolú, pea ʻoku ʻikai foki te nau kumi ki he ʻEiki ʻo e Ngaahi Kau Taú.
Ko ia ʻe motuhi atu ʻe he ʻEikí mei ʻIsileli ʻa e ʻulú mo e ikú, ʻa e vaʻá mo e kahó ʻi he ʻaho pē taha.
Ko e motuʻá ko e ʻulú ia; pea ko e palōfita ʻa ia ʻoku ako ʻaki ʻa e loí, ko e ikú ia.
He ko e kau takimuʻa ʻo e kakaí ni ʻoku nau fakatupu ʻenau faihalá; pea ko e kakai ko ia kuo nau tatakí ko kinautolu kuo fakaʻauhá.

Ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai hōifua ʻa e ʻEikí ki honau kau talavoú, pe ʻaloʻofa ki heʻenau fānau ʻoku tamai maté mo e kau uitoú; he ko e mālualoi mo e kau fai koví ʻa kinautolu taki taha, pea ʻoku lea ʻaki ʻa e valé ʻe he ngutu kotoa pē. Neongo ʻeni kotoa ʻoku teʻeki ai ke lolou ʻa hono houhaú, ka ʻoku kei mafao atu ʻa hono toʻukupú.

He ʻoku vela ʻa e fai angahalá ʻo hangē ko e afi; ʻe keina ʻe ia ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau talatalá mo e talatalaʻāmoá, pea tutu ʻe ia ke vela ʻa e ngaahi pupunga ʻakau matolu ʻo e ngaahi vaó, pea te nau ʻalu hake ʻo hangē ko e puna hake ʻa e ʻahu.
Ko e meʻa ʻi he houhau ʻo e ʻEiki ʻo e Ngaahi Kau Taú kuo fakapoʻuli ai ʻa e fonuá, pea ʻe hangē ʻa e kakaí ko e fefie ki he afi; ʻe ʻikai fakamoʻui ʻe ha tangata ʻa hono tokouá.
Pea te ne kaihaʻasi ʻi he nima toʻomataʻú kae kei fiekaia pē; pea te ne kai ʻi he toʻohemá, ka ʻe ʻikai te nau mākona; pea ʻe kai ʻe he tangata taki taha ʻa e kakano ʻo hono nima ʻoʻoná—
Ko Manase mo ʻIfalemi; pea ko ʻIfalemi mo Manase; te na kau fakataha ke tauʻi ʻa Siutá. Neongo iá ʻoku teʻeki ai ke lolou ʻa hono houhaú, ka ʻoku kei mafao atu ʻa hono toʻukupú.
